body:
@✨ Arbour ✨
The only reason I stopped reading this artist's works is because of that,
when I first found one of his work It's a bit weird but when I read more the more it became creepy and weirder

The more I read this artists stuff the more concerned I get...it really does feel like he’s writing with his heart (I hesitate to say from experience) rather than fantasy. Which is disturbing.
Shotas are cute, real kids NOPE.
Kill that bastard, a real man protects his shota
When he cried my heart broke, I don't like dirty pedo's
Im glad dat u know dat
